dict.acceptation: 俱乐部，会所；社团；夜总会；（纸牌的）梅花；
联合；募集；用棍棒打；[棒球]击球；

sent.orig: Watch out! My outfit's ridiculous, in the club lookin' so conspicuous.
sent.trans: 听好了！我这身行头虽然古怪到了club里却很拉风。

sent.orig: He, uh, joined the Club and Drama Club, so I ClubDrama Club.
sent.trans: 我开始加入那些戏剧之类的活动，因为我非得学我大哥的样子不可。

sent.orig: Xihua Club: Bowling Club, Sauna, Food, Accommodation, Club.
sent.trans: 包头锡华俱乐部：保龄球、桑拿、餐饮、客房、夜总会。

sent.orig: Rotary International has adopted a Club Leadership Plan that calls for leadership training for club members.
sent.trans: 国际扶轮已经正式通过了一项扶轮社领导计划用来倡导训练扶轮社社员的之领导力。

sent.orig: Technicians who left the club will not appear in the club photo album.
sent.trans: 凡离开本会所的技师将不会在会所相册出现。
